preconditions.precondition: An initial offer is strictly required, though in practice, it is expected OFFERs will precede a REQUEST.

mainSequence.step: Acquirer makes an OFFER to Provider
Acquirer sends a REQUEST to Provider
Provider makes a counter OFFER or abandons negotiation
Acquirer sends another REQUEST to Provider
Acquirer receives a REQUEST from Provider
Provider agrees on the negotiated matter
Provider sends an ACKnowledgement to Acquirer
